channel.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
channel.description:
"[i]Please be aware that we are currently looking at alternative ways in which to punish players who are found guilty of a macro offense. Should an alternative option become available this will be communicated to our players via our homepage.[/i]"
This was stated by Mod Alena in a private email to me. What do you think will happen? I can by now tell you that the resettings which has happened and happens has nothing to do with this. It it confirmed by JaGex that it's a bug. Or is it? Is this a way for JaGex to test out new ways to punish us botters? Discuss guys!

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:47, topic:368806”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=464939.msg3517266#msg3517266 date=1299103833]
i botted 76-99 fishing and it reset my fishing to 10 it didnt ban me.
[/quote]

K its been 4 months now. Look at the original date.[/quote]

At least he did not post a new thread with that one sentence.

Read full topic
item.source: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

jmood128:

I wish Jagex would learn and just keep banning, resetting the stat is a worse idea as the person can bot it back up…

I only know of them ever doing this in the early days of RS. The other rollbacked stats that are currently happening are a glitch (or at least that’s what I’ve heard).

Read full topic
item.source: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:18, topic:368806”]I wish someone would fucking ban these morons who troll constantly, jfc.

Anyway, I think they should keep permanently banning accounts rather than giving them multiple chances (reseting, 14-day temp ban, etc).[/quote]
We can only wish

Anyways, the messages aren’t automated. They just have pre-made responses so they can increase efficiency. Think about how many players message them about random bans and such. Trust me, if you email them about something serious, you will get a serious response.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

grev olaf:

What about a rollback as a warning, then permanent ban?

Would still just keep the idiot botters going. If we go straight to permy ban, we would only get intelligent botters that don’t bot for days at a time.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

krackkid:

Ban hammer is the only option imo, if the bots don’t get banned they will just go back.(even banning doesn’t stop botting.

Completely agree, as there are money farming bots out there that do not require skills. Just keep banning the noobs that don’t know how to bot good and get caught. Simple as that.

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:32, topic:368806”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=464939.msg3399842#msg3399842 date=1289794793]

Do you not realize that all emails sent out by Jagex are automated? They don’t even read and type out on their own…

The reply I received was not automated. Some parts were obviously copied and pasted, but the second, third, forth, and seventh passages definitely were not.
[/quote]They have a set of pre-typed paragraphs, they put them together in a way that specifically fits the offense. My brother received an email that looks exactly like yours, but the seventh paragraph looked exactly like grev’s.

Yea, like a template that they use and fill in the blanks, but obviously someone reads them.[/quote]Or they have variables that determine your offense and automatically put in the correct paragraphs? Lol, I honestly don’t know. Put I think we can all agree it’s mostly automated.

Read full topic
item.source: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @grev_olaf grev olaf
item.description:
@grev_olaf wrote:

I was a bit unclear in my post. Sorry.

What i ment was; what can teach you a lesson, keep you from botting, but still be able to play? In other words, keep all parts satisfied (minus botting).

Read full topic

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @grev_olaf grev olaf
item.description:
@grev_olaf wrote:

Well the thing here is, I’m not talking about what is. That’s not a discussion. I’m talking about things that might be, in other words speculating around the soon to come update.

EDIT:

There is an interesting part below the one I’ve kept my focus on so far. Alena seems to:

appreciate your frustration about the ban occurring and I am genuinely sorry, nobody seems to win in these situations and I wish we had a better alternative.

So they are looking for a better option, which makes the punishment a win-win situation. What punishment can do that? Teach you a lesson and keep you from botting at the same time?

Read full topic
item.source: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“grev olaf, post:27, topic:368806”]i agree, nothing else helps. but it’s easier to make a new account and bot it like shit if you get banned. if you ie get reset, or a stat rollback, you most likely will continue to play on the account, and break no rules.

do you think they will add a expiry date to macroing, like two years?[/quote]

No a ban is a ban, the only way to get it off is to be lucky and hope that someone with power will un ban it.

Read full topic

item.title: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
item.dc:creator: @grev_olaf grev olaf
item.description:
@grev_olaf wrote:

[quote author=jmood128 link=topic=464939.msg3399799#msg3399799 date=1289791847]

[quote author=grev olaf link=topic=464939.msg3399796#msg3399796 date=1289791737]

jmood128:

I wish Jagex would learn and just keep banning, resetting the stat is a worse idea as the person can bot it back up…

I don’t think so. Maby encourage to make new accounts ++, but not continue to bot on the same account. When one stat has been reset, you are aware that jagex is keeping an eye on you. [quote=“krackkid, post:21, topic:368806”]Ok well then here is my honest thought on the matter, its not a private email for one since you showed it, and others got it.

Now I think there is no real way to fix botting, its going to happen one way or another we all know it, So does JaGeX I am sure basically the only real way is to just keep banning like they been doing.[/quote]

yes i’ve touched that thought too. but i’m just looking at the options. what do you guys think could be an alternative option to the big fat ban hammer?

Read full topic
item.source: JaGex is about to change the punishment of macroing!
